title: Spec.Ops.The.Line-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Spec.Ops.The.Line-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2012
Publication Type: Repack 
Crack: {enclosing} SKIDROW
Version: 1.0.6890.0
Language:  RUS,  ENG
Sound language:  RUS,  ENG

Description: 

Spec Ops: The Line - an unusual cinematic third-person shooter that will make you enter 
into a confrontation not only with real opponents, but even with their own principles. 
Get ready to be in a world where there is no place the concept of "morality" and at 
every step we have to choose - who will live and who will die. Dubai was wiped off 
the face of the Earth horrific cataclysm. The unprecedented dust storm turned the 
once magnificent city in ruins. And now you in the role of Delta Force squad 
captain Martin Walker have to go to the hostile territory to find and return 
the home of Colonel John Konrad. Take part in the raid and battle against 
opponents who are not afraid of death. Spec Ops: The Line combines an exciting 
storyline campaign and addictive multiplayer with multiple competitive and 
cooperative modes. You will be able to enter the conflict on the side of one 
of the two factions and to prove their superiority against the background of tures
the beautiful and terrifying at the same time the ruined landscape of Dubai.

Game Features

*  The story of Martin Walker repeatedly cause you to make a choice 
   between right and necessary. 

*  The arena will be the ruins of a special operation to Dubai - the city 
   that once drowning in luxury and well-known as the most chic place on 
   earth. At each step there is grandeur mixed with destruction, and 
   preserved within the fine structures hidden death.
*  An important factor in the battles of Spec Ops: The Line serves sand. 
   Accurate shot can often radically change the course of battle. Sands like 
   living in Dubai - this uncontrollable and unpredictable force can both 
   help you and destroy you.
*  Even in the most heated skirmishes will always be companions managed 
   by artificial intelligence.
*  An exciting storyline campaign complement a variety of network modes, 
   among which there are the classic choices, and unique modifications 
   associated with the development of the main plot. You can choose one 
   of the two parties to the conflict, personalize your character and 
   customize it to fit your own style of play.

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP  (SP3), Windows Vista  (SP2), Windows 7  (SP1) 
Processor: Intel  Core  2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD  Athlon  X2 3200 + 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video: Nvidia  GeForce 9800 GTX or ATI  Radeon HD 4850 with 512 MB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX  9.0c 
Free hard drive space: 9 GB
Starting: Install and play.

Repack Features  

Do not cut / recoded 
Game Version - 1.0.6890.0 (update 2) 
DLC: Fubar Pack, Coop Chalenge Mode 
Repack by R.G.Mechanics
